inlineContent.text: To know a property has been modified. (It contains 2 instances (old, new))
To avoid copying cost with wrapping reference type - So, you can embed this object on the other state.

Equalities calculates with pointer-personality basically, if the Value type compatibles
, it does using also Value’s equalities.
This means Changes will return equals if different pointer but the value is the same.
